sect1.title: Setting up SSSD
sect1.para: SSSD (System Security Services Daemon) is a daemon that communicates with remote identity providers and allows pam and nsswitch to consume that data. SSSD can have multiple back-ends, cache users and groups, and provides features such as SSH key distributions.
